data.name: Health & Mental Well Being of your Workforce
data.summary:
One of the major challenges for founders in these unprecedented times has not only been to worry about the business but also the health and mental wellness of their employees.

In these difficult times, health and mental health related problems are starting to have a major impact on employers and businesses directly through negative impact on productivity and profits, as well as an increase in costs to deal with the issue.

We would be discussing: How to keep your workforce motivated and keep their health and mental well being intact?
